main event: A single bright and shiny object, round in shape, was observed hovering over George AFB, California on November 16, 1952.
interesting points: The object was sighted from a moving automobile for approximately 3-4 minutes., The sighting lasted until 2215 PST., The object had no trail, exhaust, or sound., Several observers attempted to see the object more closely, but were unable due to traffic., The investigator's comments indicated insufficient data for further analysis.
sighted object: a round, bright, and shiny object
witness description: Lieutenant William T. Van Schoonhoven, 1st Lieutenant USAF, observed the object while driving.
